column1: '''''Mythlore'' 43''' (Volume 12, Issue 1) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].
*"Tolkien on Fantasy in ''Smith of Wootton Major''" (by [[Martha C. Sammons]])
*"The Trans-Cosmic Journeys in the Chronicles of Narnia"
*"Saruman, Sharkey and Suruman: Analagous Figures of Eastern Ingenuity and Cunning"
*"Letters From Hell: The Symbolism of Evil in the ''Screwtape Letters''"
